segments.text: What sports do you like to play ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: In my country football is brand new , so I never learned the game when I was younger .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's a very popular game in America .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah . I heard a lot about it . Is it really that fun ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: For me , it's one of those games that are fun to both watch and play .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , I just for fun with my friends . We play two hand touch or flag football . We're too old to play tackle football .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What is two hand touch and flag football ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Instead of tackling somebody , you just have to touch them with two hands , or if it is flag football , grab the flag that the ball carrier is wearing .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I see . It's safer then right ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Exactly . We play every Saturdays on the field by the tennis courts . If you want to learn and play a little , you're welcome to join us .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'll give it a try . Give me a call and let's go down together .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ok . I'll call you Saturday morning .
segments.speaker: S1
